function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of public awareness of the term 'social distancing'","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious contact and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Public education campaigns, press briefings, public service announcements","Technologies":"Social media, websites, retail store signs","People":"General public","Owner":"Public Health Agency, Government officials"},{"Description":"Rapid change in social behaviors and habits","Impact":"Difficulty in adapting to new behaviors, increased risk of non-compliance","Mitigation":"Clear and consistent communication, reinforcement through retail store signs","Technologies":"Communication technology, signage technology","People":"General public","Owner":"Public Health Agency, Government officials"},{"Description":"Crowded places and non-essential gatherings","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious contact and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Enforcement of group size orders, restrictions on gatherings","Technologies":"Regulatory and enforcement technology","People":"General public","Owner":"Government officials"}]}
